title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4600.1 - Definition of terms and general provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4600.1 - Definition of terms and general provisions

State Regulations

Unless the context indicates otherwise, the following
definitions and the definitions set forth in General Municipal Law sections 186
and 190-a(2) are applicable throughout Subchapters A and B of this

Chapter: (a) Authorized
organization, as defined in General Municipal Law section 186(4), includes a bona fide civic organization or a bona fide organization of
volunteer ambulance workers that otherwise satisfies the definition set forth
in such statute. No political entity, including a political action fundraising
committee, shall be deemed an authorized organization. (b) Commission
means New

York State Gaming Commission. Notes

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
